articles.description: Intel announced today that it is acquiring Rivet Networks, the makers of the well-regarded Killer networking products.
articles.content:
Intel announced today that it is acquiring Rivet Networks, the makers of the well-regarded Killer networking products, for an undisclosed sum.
Rivet Networks is a terrific complement to our existing… [+903 chars]
